item.title: StackRef adds Infracost and Cossell AI to automated hackathon scoring
item.description: Big things are brewing at StackRef HQ! Today we’re pleased to announce the addition of yet more automated judging tools for use with your organization’s internal hackathons: Infracost and our own AI-powered “stack referee,” Cossell!
